Patagonian Beach Escape

Relax and rejuvenate on Patagonia's pristine beaches with this leisurely tour. Enjoy wildlife watching in Valdés Peninsula, indulge in water sports, and learn about marine life from a biologist. Perfect for those looking to unwind by the sea in one of the world's most tranquil settings.

Detailed Itinerary with Highlights and Activities

  • Day 1: Arrival in Puerto Madryn, check-in, leisure day at the beach.
  • Day 2-3: Wildlife watching in Valdés Peninsula, possible whale watching.
  • Day 4-5: Leisure days with optional snorkeling, scuba diving, or sailing.
  • Day 6: Visit to a local sea lion colony with a marine biologist.
  • Day 7: Departure.

Inclusions

Beachfront resort accommodations, all meals, transportation, guided tours, and optional water sports equipment.

Pricing and Availability

Pricing varies based on accommodation choice and season. Customizable options available.
